0.3.name: wordpress/post2sidebar-link-widget
0.3.description: Use the plugin 'Post2Sidebar Link Widget' to display text in the widget area. Define two custom fields in a post: 'WidgetHL' (Headline) and 'WidgetText' (Text or HTML). Now put some text in there. After that, just active the widget in your sidebar. The entered text only will show on this special post. Perfect for additional information e.g. links.
